subject: Mathematics
title: Conditial Statements
description: Conditional statements are statements that can be written in the form 'If p, then q'. In this lesson, we will learn about the contrapositive and converse statements relative to an original statement.
objectives: Understand the concept of the contrapositive of a statement
Understand the logical equivalence of a statement and its contrapositive
Understand the concept of the converse of a statement
Understand the logical equivalence of a statement and its converse
Understand if and only if statements
